did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Correspondence of the Ray and Gila Valley Railroad Company 1910-1921 (bulk 1910-1912)

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Ray and Gila Valley Raildroad Company.

did.abstract: Correspondence with the U.S. Post Office to establish railroad mail service between Ray and Kelvin, Ariz., 1910-1912; and one letter regarding mail service between Ray and Sonora, Ariz., 1921.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Correspondence of the Ray and Gila Valley Railroad Company (AZ 102). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Mining railroad in Pinal County, Ariz.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence with the U.S. Post Office to establish railroad mail service between Ray and Kelvin, Ariz., 1910- 1912; and one letter regarding mail service between Ray and Sonora, Ariz., 1921.
